question1.response: No, only the robot owner can have it certified.

articles.title: Article 1: Presentation
text: Welcome to the Watchbot website! These Terms of Use are a legal agreement between
(watchbot headquarters) and you. By browsing, using, visiting the site
(the "site") and its third-party applications, you agree to have the digital majority in your country and to have read the
Discord Inc. Terms of Service

articles.title: Article 2: Content on this website
text: The site and each of its elements, brands, logos, computer graphics, photographs, which compose it are protected under international intellectual property legislation.
Some icons on the site belong to
and are protected by an
Universal multimedia license

Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, adaptation of all or part of the elements of the site, whatever the means or process used, is prohibited without the prior written consent of Mareel Group.

articles.title: Article 3: Use
text: The site is offered in different web languages such as HTML, CSS, etc... For better user comfort and more pleasant graphics, we recommend that you use modern browsers such as Safari, Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge etc... The site uses a technology under JavaScript, if JavaScript is disabled on your browser, navigation on the site will be impossible for you.
Mareel Group. makes every effort to ensure reliable information and reliable updating of its websites. However, errors can occur.
Mareel Group. and its subsidiaries are in no way responsible for the use made of this information, and for any direct or indirect damage.

articles.title: Article 4: Hypertext links and Cookies
text: The site and its subdomains contain a number of hypertext links to other sites. The site does not have the ability to verify the content of the sites thus visited, and therefore assumes no liability for this fact.

Browsing the site may cause the installation of cookie(s) on the user's computer. A cookie is a small file, which does not allow the user to be identified, but which records information relating to the navigation of a computer on a site. The data thus obtained are intended to facilitate subsequent navigation on the site, and are also intended to allow various measures of attendance.

articles.title: Article 5: VIP subscriptions
text: Billing:

By purchasing a VIP membership, you authorize us to bill for 31 days only. Your payment to Mareel Group. will not be automatically renewed and you will need to go to Watchbot Dashboard in order to proceed with the payment of a new month if you wish.
Cancellation / Refund:
Any purchase made is neither refundable nor exchangeable, if you no longer want a VIP Watchbot, you will have to wait until the due date and not renew the payment.

articles.title: Article 1: Why and how do we collect your data?
text: Watchbot primarily provides an automated application for chat and social platforms (the "application"), manageable through our website (the "site", "Watchbot Dashboard", the "Dashboard") and operated by Watchbot Staff ("Watchbot Staff", "we") for users of the service ("you"). This privacy policy sets out our policy with respect to information collected from users of the application. Watchbot Staff is the "controller" of personal data collected throughout your use of the application.

articles.title: Article 2: What information do we collect?
text: When you interact with us through the Dashboard, we may collect information about you, as described in more detail below. We collect information from you when you voluntarily provide such information. For example, when you post a certification request or when you make a purchase. The information we collect may include, but is not limited to:
User Data :
We store the user ID, email address when you post a certification request. We store your user ID when you make a purchase or when you start a free trial of our products on our site.
Guild Data :
We store your server ID, owner ID, channel IDs. When you make a purchase on our site, we also store your server ID.
PayPal Data :
We store your email address, the payment ID, your ID, your First name, your Last name.

articles.title: Article 3: Where are our data processed?
text: Watchbot Staff is based in France. You consent to the processing and transfer of your information in France. The laws of France and other countries governing the collection and use of data may not be as complete or protective as the laws of the country where you live. Our servers are located in France (Roubaix, Paris and Nice).

articles.title: Article 4: What do we do with your data?
text: We use the information you provide in a manner consistent with this privacy policy. We use your data for:
- Allow data and settings to be securely stored under an account.
- Comply with legal requirements
We do not sell your data.

articles.title: Article 5: How long do we store your data?
text: All your data stored on our servers remains there as long as you use our services.

articles.title: Article 6: Questions?
text: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, you can write an email to

author: Watchbot
a subsidiary of Mareel Group.
cookies.title: Before accessing Watchbot
text: Mareel Group. uses cookies and other data to:
Measure site statistics in order to understand how our services are used.

terms: By clicking on "Send" you submit the above information to Watchbot

who will use them to send them to the team who will take care of your certification request. You will receive an email notification to know if your request has been accepted or declined (check your SPAM regularly). Your details will not be used or shared for any other purpose. You have a right to request the portability of your information, as well as the right to withdraw your consent at any time, and to refuse or request the limitation of the processing of your personal data. For more information, we invite you to email us at certifiers@watchbot.app
